According to [Ayurveda](/what-is-ayurveda%3F), health is not just absence of disease; it includes strength in the body, pleasant emotions, comfortable digestion, efficient elimination and living a productive life. Some of you have spent a lot of money trying various ways to get relief. With Practical Ayurveda we get to the root of issues so you are not dealing with the same problem forever. [Practical Ayurveda](/what-is-ayurveda%3F) is practical when it helps you deal with whatever is going on for you right now. What are your challenges? What is going on in your life? We are here to serve people who truly are ready to do what it takes to feel better. Swastha, the Sanskrit term for health, indicates not just physical, mental and emotional well-being, but spiritual advancement. Here at Practical Ayurveda we have a lot of experience helping people to get centered and stay grounded during these "modern" times. It is possible that Practical Ayurveda can be a practical method for you, when Ayurveda helps you to get healthy and stay healthy through holistic, natural, non-chemical means. To be practical, Ayurveda needs to have something to offer each unique individual, whatever your starting point may be. We are here to help you to improve your life. We are here to help you make personal breakthroughs. PracticalAyurveda.com aims to empower individuals to be their best by providing experiences and techniques that remove obstacles and enable people to face personal challenges. Obstacles and challenges, whether physical, mental, emotional, or spiritual have causes. PracticalAyurveda.com aims to find the means to address those causes. Once causes are eliminated the corresponding chain of problems will fade away. Please enjoy your visit, look around, and learn all there is to know about us. There's much to see here.
